SEARCH
Package com.example.fusion1_events.admin.notification

Class AdminNotification

java.lang.Object
com.example.fusion1_events.admin.notification.AdminNotification
public class AdminNotification extends Object
Represents a notification in the application.

Contains information such as createdAt, eventId, eventName, notificationMessage, notificationTitle, notified, read, receiverId, senderID.
